item.title: Marketer Workspace
item.description:
An internal marketing campaign platform for IBM’s global marketing teams.

Technology Stack: API, AngularJS, Typescript, ES6, Node, Karma, Jasmine, Protractor, Grunt, SASS, HTML5, CSS3, Git

item.title: IBM Cloud Computing
item.description:
A public facing website for IBM Cloud website. We dramatically increased traffic, awareness, purchase of cloud services, and established best practices to scale to global production teams.

Technology Stack: CMS, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, Git

item.title: IBM Think Management
item.description:
An intranet web application that enables IBM managers to share and learn management practices.

Technology Stack: IBM ECM, IBM Connections API, Dojo, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Grunt, SVN

item.title: Coca-Cola Mix'On
item.description:
Developed for LBi an interactive questionnaire for Coca-Cola and American Music Awards.

Technology Stack: JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3

item.title: Qnasl Device Tour
item.description:
Developed for Heartbeat Ideas an interactive 360° tour of a nasal spray.

Technology Stack: Sencha Animator, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML5, CSS3

item.title: The Weinstein Company
item.description:
Initially developed using Adobe Flash and ActionScript, I created many websites for the Weinstein Company, including their corporate sites. Around 2010, we started migrating sites to social media platforms and Wordpress.

Technology Stack: Wordpress, PHP, SQL, JavaScript, jQuery, HTML, CSS, Flash, ActionScript
